channel.title: Clause on Learner Loft
channel.description: Recent content in Clause on Learner Loft

item.title: SQL Clause: Group By, Having, IN and NOT IN
item.description: Let’s say we have a table named “Games” with the following data: GROUP BY: Think of GROUP BY like organizing your games into groups based on their ratings. It’s like sorting them into piles of similar ratings. SELECT Rating, COUNT(\*) AS NumOfGames FROM Games GROUP BY Rating; This query will count the number of games for each rating group. For example, it will show how many games have a rating of 4.
